constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 111 (Friday, June 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CHU:
H.R. 4171.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause I of Article 1, Section 8 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H3155]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Worker and Family Support.

title: Essential Skills and Child Care for Health Professions Act
